From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia


2021 Indian Hindi-language murder mystery film


Murder at Teesri Manzil 302Release posterDirected byNavneet Baj SainiWritten byNavneet - VishalProduced byAsif ShaikhStarringIrrfan KhanRanvir ShoreyDeepal ShawLucky AliNausheen Ali SardarCinematographyRavi WaliaEdited byIrfan IshakMusic bySongs:Sajid-WajidBackground Score:Sandeep ShirodkarProductioncompaniesQuantum films ltd.Practical ProductionsDistributed byZEE5Release date
31 December 2021 (2021-12-31)
Running time120 minutesCountryIndiaLanguageHindi
Murder at Teesri Manzil 302 is a 2021 Indian Hindi-language murder mystery film directed by Navneet Baj Saini, starring Irrfan Khan, Ranvir Shorey, Deepal Shaw and Lucky Ali. The film was stuck in production hell after its completion in the year 2009. Termed as one among Khan's unreleased films, finally premiered  on ZEE5 on 31 December 2021, but with poor reviews. It marks a posthumous appearance for Khan following his death on 29 April 2020.[1][2][3][4]


Plot[edit]
A wealthy businessman's wife mysteriously disappears, and a team of investigating officers embark on a search for her. Will they be able to decipher what's going on?

Cast[edit]
Irrfan Khan as Shekhar Sharma (Sheky)
Ranvir Shorey as Abhishek Deewan
Deepal Shaw as Maya Deewan
Lucky Ali
Nausheen Ali Sardar
Production[edit]
The film was in production from 2008, finally was completed in 2009 but was in the cans for years until it was premiered through ZEE5.[5][6] It became the posthumous release of Irrfan Khan, who died in 2020.[2]

References[edit]


^ Gupta, Shubhra (31 December 2021). "Murder At Teesri Manzil 302 movie review: Jaw-droppingly bad Irrfan Khan film that was best left unreleased". The Indian Express. Retrieved 1 January 2022.

^ a b Khurana, Archika (31 December 2021). "Reviews - Murder At Teesri Manzil 302". The Times of India. Retrieved 1 January 2022.

^ Bhaskaran, Gautaman (31 December 2021). "Murder at Teesri Manzil 302 Review: Late Irrfan Khan Lights Up the Screen with His Charming Presence". News 18. Retrieved 1 January 2022.

^ Sharma, Vishnu (31 December 2021). "14 साल बाद रिलीज हुई इरफान की आखिरी फिल्म, विलेन के रूप में दिखे काफी दमदार". Zee News. Retrieved 1 January 2022.

^ "Irrfan's Murder at Teesri Manzil 302, Sanjay Mishra's Turtle and Waah Zindagi to stream on Zee5". India Today. 30 December 2021. Retrieved 1 January 2022.

^ "Irrfan Khan's Long-Delayed Film 'Murder At Teesri Manzil 302' To Finally Release On OTT". Outlook India. 28 December 2021. Retrieved 1 January 2022.
